name: Floor is LAVA!!
description:
"Floor is LAVA!!" is a simplistic survival game by SuperJSM. This game contains simplistic graphics (Abstract) and contains the following features:

-2 gamemodes

-gamerules menu

-singleplayer and local 2 player

-a few more things you will find out once you play!

*Please note that this game is in beta stage so many features could be unfinished or removed before the final release. Also, the game is programmed using a programming language that has poorer performance compared to other languages, so do not be surprised if the game has lag. Again, this game IS in beta stage so please expect everything to be terrible.*
